text:
Everyone has a choice when they are elected to Congress. You can be a work horse, a show horse, or a horse’s ass. 

The majority of House Republicans are workhorses and stand behind @SpeakerMcCarthy. 

Stop the grandstanding and get back to work.

This EV battery factory is funded by the Inflation Reduction Act AND needs a coal plant to ensure it keeps running.

Despite Washington Democrats best efforts, coal won’t be going away anytime soon.

Their hypocrisy is astounding.
cowboystatedaily.com/2023/09…

I stand with @SpeakerMcCarthy. 

With the crisis at the southern border, fentanyl pouring into our communities, and $33 trillion of national debt, we need a strong leader like Kevin McCarthy. 

I am confident he will continue to deliver results that put America first.

The government has been temporarily funded, but our work is far from over. 

To my colleagues on both sides of the aisle: put aside partisan antics and pass bills that benefit Americans.

My full statement below⬇️

We have a moral obligation to initiate a strategic decoupling from China & their inhumane labor practices. 

Read the bipartisan letter calling on the @CBP to stop the import of solar panels that were made with Chinese forced labor⬇️

foxnews.com/politics/dem-gop…

My priority is introducing bills that benefit American families.

I highlighted my Helping HANDS for Families Act during a Work & Welfare hearing. This bill supports families by giving them better access to resources that’ll provide relief & stability for families across the U.S.
My statement on a lawsuit filed against President Trump to disqualify him from appearing on the 2024 Presidential Ballot in West Virginia ⬇️

.@POTUS only takes credit when gas prices are falling but the facts speak for themselves.

On average, gas has been more expensive during Biden’s presidency than any other term. His anti-energy policies are unacceptable.

. @POTUS, how many illegal crossings do there need to be until you realize enough is enough?

Secure the border and put Americans first.

Appalachia is full of beauty, natural resources, and hard working Americans. 

@GReschenthaler and I launched the Appalachian Caucus to ensure the voices of our communities are heard in Congress. I look forward to producing policy that benefits the great people of Appalachia.

Having access to affordable health care is the difference between life & death for many rural Americans. 

That’s why the Bipartisan Rural Health Caucus is focused on implementing quality health care policies, providing care in all communities, & prioritizing health care workers.

Many products made by women in developing countries aren’t included in the Generalized System of Preferences program due to lack of resources.

I questioned @EBGresser on how the reporting disproportionately affects women. I’ll continue advocating for a pro women GSP program.

Unacceptable. 

@POTUS secure the southern border NOW.

This is a chilling picture at our southern border.

Every community is hurting because of the border crisis, but @POTUS and @SecMayorkas continue to ignore it.

This isn’t a partisan issue, it’s an American issue. Secure the southern border NOW.

.@WaysandMeansGOP held a hearing on the flawed implementation of the No Surprises Act and the impact it’s had on patients. 

My priority is to make sure West Virginians have access to affordable health care and are not stuck with surprise medical bills.

Yesterday, I hosted a round table with CNX CEO @NickDeIuliis on energy production in Appalachia & the Methane Reduction & Economic Growth Act.

Capturing mine methane & converting it to usable energy increases U.S. energy independence, economic growth, and job creation.

This is what happens when our political leaders prioritize pronouns over our national security.

It also highlights the importance of passing Defense appropriations this week. @HouseGOP’s focus is on projecting American strength & defunding woke policies.

wsj.com/us-news/search-under…

This week, Congress will vote on the Lower Costs, More Transparency Act: a bipartisan win & saves $800 million over the next decade.

Clear, upfront health care prices show @HouseGOP’s commitment to delivering affordable & accessible health care in the U.S.washingtonpost.com/politics/…

The “Inflation Reduction” Act:
- Increased inflation for every American
- Destroyed domestic energy production
- Raised taxes and health care costs

Of course every Republican voted against it.

Mining in other countries when we have the ability to mine cleaner and cheaper in the U.S. is a slap in the face to American workers. 

The Interagency Working Group recommendation for @Interior will slow domestic mining and kill American jobs. miller.house.gov/media/press…

I joined @RepNewhouse in condemning @GovMLG for depriving the people of New Mexico of their constitutional right to bear arms.

For 30 days, citizens will be fined up to $5k if they want to exercise the Second Amendment. This is unacceptable & I’ll always stand for our freedoms.

President Biden is ignoring the law. The Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act was passed to protect the Uyghurs from the CCP, but the Biden Admin refuses to enforce it. 

I will continue to call out this hypocrisy and make sure UFLPA is implemented. realclearenergy.org/articles…

Today, I questioned @USTradeRep on the Biden Admin’s trade priorities and what they are doing to bolster trade relationships with our allies in South America and Asia. 

It’s vital the U.S. develops strong trade agreements to maintain and improve our influence abroad.

We will never forget the horrific terrorist attack on the the United States on September 11, 2001.

Today, we honor the thousands of Americans who lost their lives, their families who grieve, and the heroic first responders who answered the call to service.

The Admin has negotiated the U.S. into a socialist tax scheme that will devastate our taxpayers as China continues to subsidize & grow their communist economy.

This should alarm every American. @WaysandMeansGOP will stop this betrayal of U.S. businesses.

miller.house.gov/media/press…

I joined @WaysandMeansGOP on a trip to Europe to discuss the Biden Admin’s global socialist tax surrender with the OECD.

This radical agenda gives China an economic advantage and burdens American taxpayers unfairly without the approval of Congress.

We are fighting back.

Happy Labor Day, West Virginia!

Today we celebrate and recognize every man and woman who has worked hard to make America the greatest country in the world.

Have a restful and relaxing day surrounded by friends and family!

Stopping the horrors of drug & human trafficking is a top priority for @SpeakerMcCarthy’s Task Force to combat Mexican Drug Cartels.

I’ve seen the devastation & suffering Biden Admin’s open border policies are having on every community in the U.S.

We will put a stop to this.

Fentanyl has taken the lives of too many Americans. Children are being robbed of their futures at the hands of our open southern border, which is allowing fentanyl and crime to flow into the U.S.

This needs to stop immediately. We must secure the border.

This summer, Americans experienced firsthand the devastation Bidenomics has on their wallets. Gas prices have skyrocketed since Joe Biden took office and continue to do so everyday.

@HouseGOP will fight Biden’s war on energy to lower costs for hardworking Americans.

The success of @NewRiverNPS continues to have a positive economic impact on #WV. This beautiful park not only promotes tourism in our state but also provides jobs for our communities.

Read my statement ⬇️
miller.house.gov/media/press…

.@SteveScalise is a strong leader, a great friend, and a fighter. 

Matt and I are praying for his quick and full recovery.

State of Emergency declared for Kanawha, Braxton, Calhoun, Clay, and Roane Counties due to flooding. 

Emergency protocol is being implemented and my office is monitoring the situation closely. Please follow local enforcement guidelines and stay safe.

Two years ago, we unnecessarily lost 13 servicemen during the disastrous Afghanistan withdrawal. The Biden Admin has not been held accountable for the lives that were lost & the families deserve answers. We will continue to honor those who paid the ultimate price for our freedom.

With autumn around the corner, driving through the mountains & visiting West Virginia should be on everyone’s bucket list this fall.

As you make your travel plans, visit the @WVtourism website to see how much our wild and wonderful state has to offer.

Our open southern border has led to an unprecedented rise of crime and drugs in the U.S. while posing an international security risk.

@HouseGOP has a plan to secure the border. Joe Biden’s border crisis must end for the safety of communities around the country.

I’m excited to launch the Congressional Appalachian Caucus with @GReschenthaler.

We’re focused on delivering energy, health, & trade policies that prioritize & provide opportunities for Americans who live across Appalachia.

miller.house.gov/media/press…
I encourage all members of Congress to go on a ride along and see how your community is being harmed by cartels taking advantage of the open southern border. There is no time to waste.

As a member of the task force to combat Mexican drug cartels, I joined @ICEgov on a ride along to see first hand how drugs & human trafficking are embedded in America. 

The fight for the U.S. is not overseas or at the border, but in our communities.

Joe Biden admits it: the Inflation Reduction Act wasn’t a truthful way to describe the billions of dollars being spent on ‘green’ policies. 

Today, the White House is celebrating the IRA instead of telling Americans why their tax dollars were needlessly spent. 

Shame on him.

My staff will be at the West Virginia state fair and will have a constituent services table today through Friday from 9 am - 4 pm.

Come stop by!
Freedom is never free. There aren't words to describe the sacrifice Gold Star families have made. Today, we honored them and their heroes and thanked them for their service to the United States.

It was great to meet with the select speciality hospital in Charleston today! The high quality services provided at this hospital ensures our highest acuity patients get the best care possible. 

I’m grateful for all the work they do for West Virginians.

It was an honor to speak at and attend the grand opening of Greenlee Rural Health Center at the Pocahontas County Memorial Hospital! 

My office was glad to submit a Community Funding Request for this hospital, where more people in #WV will have access to quality health care.
Yesterday, I toured the Patriot Guardens Apple Orchard. I was encouraged to see this abandoned mine site was transformed into an apple orchard, bringing more jobs to #WV and utilizing the land well.

It was great to see the new 911 center in Nicholas County! This new location will provide more safety for West Virginia’s more rural areas. My office was glad to help secure Community Project Funding to support this needed center in #WV.
West Virginia brings people together! #LIVBroadcast #LIVGolf

Today, I visited Patriot Guardens Urban Farm in Dunbar, WV.

I enjoyed seeing the opportunities this farm provides to our veterans & military members as they start up farming operations and productions. 

Thank you for giving back to those who’ve sacrificed so much for the U.S.

All West Virginians deserve clean, running water especially those in the rural areas.

I was honored to cut the ribbon for the White Oak Waterline Extension Project. Because of this, all water projects in Raleigh county are now 98% complete.

Kidney patients should have access to as many cost effective therapies as possible.

I introduced the Kidney PATIENT Act with @RepBuddyCarter, @RepAnnieKuster, & @RepTerriSewell to provide affordable treatment for patients.

Read more ⬇️
miller.house.gov/media/press…

Yesterday, I had a great time visiting #WV’s first Smithsonian affiliated museum, Heritage Farm Museum and Village.

This beautiful village will continue attracting people from across the U.S. & promote the tourism industry in Southern West Virginia.

I joined @RepRonEstes & @WaysandMeansGOP in sending a letter to @USTreasury reminding them Congress controls tax policy & the Biden Admin administers it.

I will not stand for American taxpayer money funding a global socialist agenda. I will always put America first.

Last week, I joined @CPAC to bring awareness to the evil of human trafficking. It’s past time to secure the border and stop this nightmare from impacting our communities.

miller.house.gov/media/press…

I joined @RepTerriSewell in introducing a bill that will provide chronic kidney disease patients the resources and access to treatment they need to fight this ‘silent killer’.

Read more ⬇️

miller.house.gov/media/press…

After 9 years, the Mountain Valley Pipeline will finally be completed and the U.S. is a step closer to global energy dominance.

#MVP creates jobs and ensures U.S. energy security. @HouseGOP is delivering on our commitment to America.

wsj.com/articles/supreme-cou…
Thank you @SpeakerMcCarthy for your leadership in ensuring the Mountain Valley Pipeline is completed!

Today, I introduced the Rural Jobs Act which delivers for communities that need it most.

This bill builds on the New Market Tax Credit to cut costs for businesses & provides opportunities for rural areas across the U.S.

miller.house.gov/media/press…

All three branches of government agree: the completion of the Mountain Valley Pipeline is legal. People are sick of politics interfering with energy production in the name of climate change. I applaud SCOTUS for ruling in favor of U.S. energy independence.
miller.house.gov/media/press…

Today, the Clinical Lab Price Transparency Act passed in the @WaysandMeansGOP’s price transparency package.

As it goes to the House floor, we’re a step closer to ensuring patients are informed of costs upfront to make wise decisions on their health care.

miller.house.gov/media/press…

With record high inflation & increasing prices, Americans shouldn’t be forced to pay more in taxes, especially to foreign nations.

The Biden Admin wants to surrender our tax dollars to other countries. @HouseGOP will stop them.

foxnews.com/opinion/quiet-ne…

I’ve said it once and I’ll say it again: our health care system is the only one where patients don’t know how much they’ll pay before receiving treatment.

We owe it to patients to change that.

Watch more ⬇️
Glad to join @RepFeenstra in the introduction of this bill that will protect our second amendment rights.

Today, I introduced legislation that will provide patients with price transparency for clinical lab tests.

Patients should have control of their health care decisions and not be stuck with surprise bills.

Read more ⬇️
miller.house.gov/media/press…

Thank you to @WVaChamber for hosting me for a business roundtable yesterday.

I will continue working on policies that aid our #WV job creators as they continue to grow and prosper.

I had so much fun reading to the Salvation Army Boys & Girls Club. These children are the future of #WV and it was a blast talking about how the government works.

Thanks for visiting me in the office!

Patients deserve the best quality of care no matter where they live in the U.S.

I introduced the Rural Hospital Technical Assistance Program Act with @RonnyJacksonTX & @RepDerekKilmer to support hospitals in rural America as they care for our communities.
miller.house.gov/media/press…

The OECD is attempting to make American businesses less competitive and allow foreign governments to dictate our tax laws.

The Biden Administration is effectively negotiating the U.S. into a global socialist agenda.

The only place the IRA reduced inflation is in other countries. 

Washington Democrats yet again sell out Americans for foreign interests.

The Biden Administration’s newest tax scheme is illegal and gives American tax dollars to foreign countries.

I refuse to give into Joe Biden’s global socialist agenda.

Read my new op-ed in @FoxNews.

foxnews.com/opinion/quiet-ne…

Today is Gliblastoma Awareness Day. As someone who personally knows the impact that GBM has on patients, caregivers, and families, I will continue work in Congress to educate about and help bring an end to this disease.

BREAKING: @USTreasury official couldn’t answer when he was asked if the Biden Administration was trying to implement socialism. 

They aren’t even trying hide their global socialist agenda.

Today, @RepTerriSewell & I launched the bipartisan Congressional Friends of Ecuador Caucus to show our strong support of Ecuador.

As a co-chair, I am looking forward to promoting U.S.-Ecuador shared values in trade and democracy.

The completion of #MVP is law. The 4th Circuit Court is needlessly holding up U.S. energy production & Republicans will fight back.

I urge parties involved with the construction of #MVP to ignore the 4th Circuit & continue as scheduled.

miller.house.gov/media/press…

It’s an honor to welcome His Excellency, President @Isaac_Herzog of Israel for a joint session with Congress.

Our bilateral relationship has grown stronger & will continue to do so through our commitment to democracy & economic prosperity. America will always stand with Israel!

Israel is not a racist or apartheid state.  

All 435 members should vote in support of Israel and condemn all forms of antisemitism.

This is a no brainer.

Last week, @AlexEpstein joined the Coal Caucus to discuss how valuable coal is to U.S. national security.

Coal is under attack due to Washington Democrats expensive “green” policies. The coal caucus is committed to working on policies that promote American coal to power the U.S.

The FY2024 NDAA passed the House and will:
✅ provide a 5.2% pay increase to service members
✅ stop the radical woke agenda from infiltrating our military
✅ counter China and strengthen partnerships 

@houseGOP has delivered for the American people. 

miller.house.gov/media/press…

I urge all parties involved with the construction of #MVP to ignore the 4th circuit and continue as scheduled. 

This ruling will not stand.

Because the Fiscal Responsibility Act was signed into law, the radical 4th circuit court no longer has jurisdiction over the Mountain Valley Pipeline. These activist judges are blatantly disregarding the law and stopping American energy production.

.@POTUS flying across the world to discuss our ever changing climate does little to help Americans here at home.

@HouseGOP is fully focused on lowering energy costs, countering Chinese scams & slave labor, and unlocking domestic production & permitting.

Biden’s policies have made our southern border into a front door for the cartels to bring crime, fentanyl, and other drugs to the U.S. that are destroying our communities.

@HouseGOP is working on securing our border and stopping the flood of drugs into the U.S.

Serving on the Task Force to Combat Mexican Drug Cartels is not something I take lightly.

#WV has experienced the devastation of fentanyl crisis firsthand and it’s time Congress took action.

Happy 4th of July, West Virginia!

May you enjoy this day surrounded by friends and family as we celebrate the independence of our great country!

May God bless America! 🇺🇸

I had such a wonderful time meeting and talking with students from the Jobs for #WV Graduates program with @WVaChamber.

Our students are set up for success and I’m excited to see the economic impact they will have on West Virginia!

It was a pleasure meeting with the President and university officials of @gopioneers in Glenville, WV. 

I am grateful for the university’s hard work to better the education system. With their instruction, students are set up for a successful future.

CMS included an add-on payment for pediatric end stage renal disease (ESRD) patients in their proposed ESRD payment rule. 

I advocated for this modifier in an April letter to CMS, & I’m happy to see CMS listening & attending to the needs of ESRD patients. healthcarefinancenews.com/ne…

.@westearncaucus & I sent a letter to @EPAMichaelRegan urging the EPA to give Americans more time to have a say on the regulations in the New Carbon Rule.

This rule would shut down power plants across the U.S. Americans deserve to voice their concerns. 

miller.house.gov/media/press…

Since 2014, @LilysPlaceWV has helped ease withdrawal symptoms and take care of infants that have been exposed to drug substances during the prenatal stage.

Thank you for having me and for your hard work in protecting the wellbeing of our children!

I was honored to tour @MUSportsMed & @HerdFacilities with @RepBradWenstrup to meet with doctors & staff to ensure our student athletes are taken care of.

I’m thankful for the collaboration of these two facilities that sets our children’s & communities wellbeing up for success.

I had a great time today at the @AFPhq roundtable discussing why domestic energy production is necessary to protect America’s national security. 

@RepBradWenstrup & I spoke with people from OH, PA, & WV on how our shared resources and energy policies will fuel the U.S.
I’m joining @AFPhq with @RepBradWenstrup on Monday for a roundtable to discuss domestic energy production and policies we are both working on to make sure the U.S. remains energy dominant.

Seven years ago, West Virginia suffered one of the worst floods in our history. 

We will never forget the 23 West Virginians who lost their lives and the devastation that followed. 

#WV is resilient and we will continue to rebuild together after this tragedy.

🚨 Tune in at 7:30 am on 800 WVHU for the @TomRoten Morning Show to hear more on what @WaysandMeansGOP is doing to hold Hunter Biden accountable for his tax evasion crimes and make sure the IRS and DOJ are held responsible for their role in the investigation.

🚨BREAKING: @WaysandMeansGOP released the IRS whistleblower’s testimony regarding Hunter Biden’s tax evasion.

Biden’s DOJ and IRS are obstructing justice and playing favorites.

This stops today.

With the passage of my Saving Gig Economy Taxpayers Act in @WaysandMeansGOP bill package, Americans will not be burdened with unnecessary taxes from the Biden Admin.

My bill makes sure money is put back in taxpayers pockets, not taken away by the IRS.

This ruling sets a dangerous precedent for the U.S. & harms our kids. 

Kids shouldn’t be given sex change surgeries.

Instead of performing life-altering surgeries on them, doctors should provide support & mental health care to kids going through puberty. apnews.com/article/politics-…

According to the FY22 @US_FDA report, 52% of emergency medicine products in America are made outside the U.S.

That’s a 52% dependence rate on our adversaries. MADE in America Act addresses & prioritizes domestic drug production & our national security.

fda.gov/about-fda/center-dru…

I was honored to co-chair this year’s Congressional Art Competition with @RepKamlagerDove & see all the beautiful works of art made by students from each district across the U.S.

I’m excited to continue promoting the talents of our students.

Congratulations!

Happy 160th Birthday, West Virginia!

The abundance of natural resources, hardworking West Virginians, & the breathtaking natural beauty truly makes the state #AlmostHeaven.

I love our wild & wonderful state!

Happy Father’s Day, West Virginia!

May you spend this wonderful day surrounded by your loved ones and family!

For 248 years, our brave army soldiers have been defending the United States and protecting our freedom. 

Happy birthday, @USArmy! Thank you for selflessly serving our nation and for your sacrifice for the United States.

Happy flag day America! We are blessed to live in the greatest country in the world, it makes sense that our flags should be made here too.

Our flag is recognized as a symbol of hope & freedom & I’m honored to cosponsor @RepStefanik’s Make American Flags in America Act.

The Tax Cuts for Working Families Act is a guaranteed tax break that gives money back to Americans through tax reductions.

This bill is a needed first step to providing relief to tax payers who are being crushed by Biden’s inflationary policies.

During a @WaysandMeansGOP field hearing in #WV, we heard from a struggling small business owner who had to decide between paying for her employees' health insurance or keeping the lights on.

Bad policies coming out of Washington have devastating results on hardworking Americans.

Let me be clear: the @WaysandMeansGOP implements the tax code, not the Treasury Department.

U.S. taxes should NEVER be paid to foreign governments, in China, or elsewhere. The Defending American Jobs & Investment Act is a needed check on the Biden Admin's failed negotiations.

The U.S. economy should not be dependent on China for our agriculture, energy, or medicine.

We need a strategic decoupling from China and the Build it in America Act puts the U.S. interests first.

It's time to bring our manufacturing home.

The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act brought economic growth and jobs back to the U.S. But with Biden's inflationary policies, much of the progress we made with TCJA has been lost.

@WaysandMeansGOP's American Families & Jobs Act restores these provisions & will replenish the U.S. economy.

Coal has long been the foundation of #WV. Mines that have been shut down by Washington can still produce energy through Carbon Capture.

My bill makes sure our coal communities will power the U.S. into the future.

Read my op-ed in the @IntelligencerWV ⬇️

REMINDER: IRS Commissioner admitted the 1099-K threshold should change back to $20,000 from the Biden Admin's $600.

Right now,@WaysandMeansGOP is making sure Americans aren't being needlessly taxed like Joe Biden wants. The Small Business Jobs Act will change the threshold back.

The Biden Admin's inaction on trade policy has pushed Taiwan to the wayside & left them at the whim of the CCP.

Congress must take action. @WaysandMeansGOP is focused on implementing lasting trade agreements with our allies & securing Taiwan's future in the free world.

.@WaysandMeansGOP has traveled the nation & heard from real Americans on the problems their facing in their businesses & communities.

The American Families & Jobs Act is the solution they asked for.

Tune in as we mark up this historic economic package.

As the second largest coal producer, #WV has powered the nation for generations. I will fight to protect & preserve one of America’s greatest natural resources.

My husband and I own car dealerships, so I understand the impact policies coming from Washington have on supply chain issues and the economic success of our auto industries.
